comments.body:
This is wrong. It includes the preceding space in the link. It should be

```Ruby
            l = l.gsub(/(^| )(https?:\/\/[A-Za-z0-9_\/\.\-]+[A-Za-z0-9\/])/,
                       '\1[\2](\2)')
```
